chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about the difficulty in accessing customer care and being referred to a bot that cannot help.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's capabilities or provide a way for customers to speak to a human representative.

complaint.description: The customer purchased data but did not receive it.
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the issue by either providing the purchased data or refunding the customer's money.

meta.review_content: Good evening..today I purchased 6 gigs of data from the vodacom app..the money was taken from my bank account but I habent received the data..I attempted to call customer care and the only response I was routed to was a bot named Tobi who is not programmed for any queries ..It seems like Vodacom has no human beings manning a call center .This is the most difficult cell service provider to access via customer care and it seems they deliberately have set their automated response to eventually refer us to a bot that can do nothing .I would please like to see my data or  my money refunded ..and maybe speak to an actual person from Vodacom .
